import React from 'react' import close from '../../images/close.png' import './style.scss' const Modal = (props) => { const {setShow, dataBooks} = props const {categories, title, authors, description, infoLink} = dataBooks?.volumeInfo const onClickShow = () => { setShow(false) } return(

{categories}

{title}

{authors}

{description}

) } export default Modal
